thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Masonite International Q4 Earnings Per Share $2.48

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Masonite International Q4 Earnings Per Share $2.48
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Masonite International Corp:
* ORATION REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.70 TO $4.20 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.71 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.48 * Q4 SALES ROSE 6 PERCENT TO $509 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 SALES UP 6 TO 8 PERCENT * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.84, REVENUE VIEW $511.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $2.16 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.95 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* MASONITE INTERNATIONAL - ‍EXPECTS 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE IN RANGE OF $280 MILLION TO $300 MILLION & DILUTED ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $3.70 TO $4.20​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
